title: Cauchy Function Calculation
description: CAUCHY calculates the density function for Cauchy.
name: CAUCHY

input.name: X
input.description: The first parameter of the Cauchy function.

input.name: T
input.description: The second parameter, which alters the position of the distribution.

input.name: U
input.description: The scale parameter for the Cauchy distribution.

return_value.description: The computed value of the Cauchy function based on the provided input parameters.
